official_title: Resolves that Mr. Dole, of Kansas, be, and he is hereby, assigned to service on the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

summary.text: Assigns Mr. Dole, of Kansas, to serve on the Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service, to fill a vacancy on that committee, and directs that he be relieved from his service on the Select Committee on Small Business.

titles.title: Resolves that Mr. Dole, of Kansas, be, and he is hereby, assigned to service on the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
